roleset.name: copy

example.name: passive
example.text: The next to be cloned , human insulin , had market potential and Genentech licensed it to Eli Lilly , which produced 80 % of the insulin used by 1.5 million U.S. diabetics .

example.name: ARG1
example.text: The next to be cloned , human insulin , had market potential and Genentech licensed it to Eli Lilly , which produced 80 % of the insulin used by 1.5 million U.S. diabetics .

example.name: All args
example.text: Don Wolf and colleagues at the Oregon Regional Primate Research Center reported their cloning of two rhesus monkeys .

roleset.note: CLONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clone' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from clone.01-v predicate notes)
CLONING-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry clone.01. No VN, FN mapping. (from cloning.01-n)
